name: Quackup: Quack Attack!
description:
Jonathin Quackup is a wandering superhero who travels around and helps those in need.

One day things go horribly crazy... Aliens invade the planet and the world goes into chaos! During all the craziness villains break out of the Albian prison and monsters go on the attack!
The world is doomed! Or is it?

Looks like its up to Jonathin to save the day. Its Quack Attack!
